title: Pixel 2 XL unable to connect to any form of wifi network
content:
My Pixel 2 XL refuses to connect to my home network, even when its set to be unprotected. When i attempt to connect it states that it first fails to save the connection, than that it is unable to connect to the network.

I have reset the network settings multiple times, and have booted into safe mode as well without any luck. I have also made sure that i am on the latest version of android as well.
